mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hl_order (id, user_id, pay_type, order_status, order_amount, pay_amount, gmt_create, gmt_updated) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{payType}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderAmount}, #{payAmount}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_status, pay_amount, gmt_create FROM hl_order WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT count(id) AS totalOrder FROM hl_order
SELECT count(id) AS totalOrder FROM hl_order WHERE order_status = 2
SELECT sum(order_amount) FROM hl_order WHERE order_status = 4

SELECT count(hl_order_product.id) FROM hl_order_product, hl_order WHERE hl_order.id = order_id AND title LIKE '%魅族%' AND 1>TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, hl_order_product.gmt_updated, now()) AND order_status = 4
SELECT count(hl_order_product.id) FROM hl_order_product, hl_order WHERE hl_order.id = order_id AND title LIKE '%魅蓝%' AND 1>TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, hl_order_product.gmt_updated, now()) AND order_id = 4

SELECT hl_order.id, user_id, hl_order.gmt_updated, pay_amount, order_status, pro_id, image, title, price, number, total_fee FROM hl_order, hl_order_product WHERE hl_order.id = order_id LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageCount}

SELECT hl_order.id, user_id, hl_order.gmt_updated, pay_amount, order_status, pro_id, image, title, price, number, total_fee FROM hl_order, hl_order_product WHERE hl_order.id = order_id AND order_status = #{status} LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageCount}
